summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.1°C) and outside temperature (down 4.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1533 m), feels like temperature (up 8.0°C), outside temperature (up 6.5°C), and dew point temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1143.0m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1696.8m and 2680m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
